de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation
Class Hive

java.lang.Object
  de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.AbstractMovingAgent
      de.thinktel.foragingBee.simulation.Hive
All Implemented Interfaces:
IIterationAgent, IMovingAgent, IVisualAgent, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
public class Hive
extends AbstractMovingAgent

A class simulating the hive. Its superclass is AbstractMovingAgent which performs in the simulation step step(SimState) (nothing).

Changes:

  • 20090901: This class inherits directly from AbstractMovingAgent because the visualization for this object is defined in the MASON specific part of the simulation.

Copyright 2009 Joerg Hoehne

Author:
hoehne (Jörg Höhne)

Constructor Detail

Hive

public Hive(ForagingHoneyBeeSimulation simulation,
            boolean is3dMode,
            javax.vecmath.Point3d location,
            double size,
            double honey)
The constructor for a hive. This constructor calls the constructor of the superclass by providing the hive's color.

Parameters:
simulation - The simulation where this hive resides in.
location - The location of the hive.
size - The size (diameter) of the hive.
honey - The initial amount of honey the hive contains.

getHoney

public double getHoney(double amount)
Get some honey out of the honey store of this hive. If more honey is requested than available the amount of honey is set to the available amount.

Parameters:
amount -
Returns:
The requested amount of honey, less otherwise.

step

public void step(sim.engine.SimState state)
This method is performed when the next step for the agent is computed. This agent does nothing, so nothing is inside the body of the method.

Parameters:
state - The SimState environment.
